description: Try our easy to follow Beetroot, Rhubarb & Apple Pie recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Beetroot, Rhubarb & Apple Pie Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place pie on a baking tray. Bake for 45 minutes or until golden brown. Serve drizzled with cream.
